task_definition_name: Android Field Officer App - Replace all hard-coded strings present
description:
**Android Field Officer App** currently contains a lot of hard-coded strings in the code; having hard-coded strings in the code is not desirable as it makes the app difficult to translate into different languages. 

Your task would be to replace all hard-coded strings present in code with **@string resource** annotation. All the hard-coded strings need to be removed from the code and then placed in the **strings.xml** resource file. The removed hard-coded strings then need to be referenced from the **strings.xml** resource file in the code.

**NOTE -** Some hard-coded strings need **not** be replaced in the android layout resource file, as they'll be rendered in real time when the app runs.

**References - **

1-> [GitHub issue](https://github.com/openMF/android-client/issues/412 "Hard-coded strings")

2-> [Documentation on String Resources](https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html "Documentation")
 
3-> [How to find hard-coded strings in an Android app](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30799211/android-find-all-hardcoded-strings-in-code-using-android-studio "Hint")
